entry.title: $2700 // SPACIOUS 1 BEDROOM APARTMENT ON TOP FLOOR - FULLY FURNISHED
entry.content:
Up for rent is our fully furnished apartment on the top floor of a 5th floor walk-up on a tree-lined side street in the Upper East Side. The unit is a large (630 sq ft), bright and sun-drenched, true 1 bedroom apartment. It is conveniently located with easy access to restaurants, stores, parks, and public transit. The apartment is two blocks away from the 2nd Ave subway line. For medical students, residents, fellows, and attendings, it is within walking distance to Lennox Hill Hospital, Weill Cornell, New York Presbyterian, Hospital for Special Surgery (HSS).

This apartment is great for individuals, couples or families who appreciate more space. The neighborhood is quiet, family-friendly and extremely safe. On Saturday mornings, there's a farmer's market right across the street bringing fresh produce literally right to your doorstep.

This is a true 1 bedroom apartment with a large living room, dining alcove area, and a full kitchen. There is hardwood floor throughout. The apartment gets plenty of natural light and is well ventilated. The bedroom has a queen bed, nightstands, and dresser, for your use. The living room has a sofa that folds out to a full bed along with a desk and dresser. There are three closets, including two walk-in closets. There is also a coin operated washer and dryer in the basement.

entry.title: $2050 // 1BR/1BA Available for Rent Anytime On or After Aug 15th
entry.content: I have lived in this 1BR/1BA for over a year now, and it's extremely quiet for being right in the hustle and bustle of NYC! The bedroom has amazing sunlight (southern exposure) in the afternoon, and it comes with a full kitchen (dishwasher included!) and a bathtub as well. This apartment is on the 2nd floor so it's very safe, and there are two secured lobby doors. The superintendent lives next door, and he is super responsive if there are any issues. There are mostly professionals living in this building, and noise hasn't been an issue as everyone is respectful of that. There are three laundromats within 1-2 blocks away so you certainly have your pick!

entry.content:
UES 1 bedroom apartment available starting Sept 1. Walk-up, pet-friendly, laundry in building, located on 81st/2nd just two blocks from the 2nd ave subway 83rd st entrance. Short walk to 4, 5, 6 trains, Central Park, Fairway, Whole Foods and numerous restaurants, bars, cafes, shops, etc.
